content.title: UTILITIES - PLANNING
content.description: Enhance your planning skills - useful links and information
content.keywords: utilities, planning, planning skills, vision, strategy, logistics, innovation, enhance skills, advice, expertise, experts in the field, useful links
board: t¬109¬40¬<font size="4">Enhance your planning skills by honing in on advice from the experts in the field and discover useful links.</font>¬426

t¬198¬101¬Planning enables an entrepreneur or an organization to chart a course toward the achievement of goals and envisioning desired results. The process begins with reviewing the current situation and identifying what needs to be improved in the future.  

To be successful the necessary steps need to be determined, whether measured in financial terms, or in goals that include being highly rated in production standards and customer satisfaction.
¬340
